mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lock_order ( lock_no, fee, order_no, user_id, insert_author, update_author ) VALUES ( #{lock_no}, #{fee}, #{order_no}, #{user_id}, #{user_id}, #{user_id} );
mapper.update: UPDATE lock_order set end_time = now(), fee = #{fee}, `type` = 1 , total_time =(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(start_time)) where lock_no = #{lock_no} and end_time is null
UPDATE lock_order set end_time = now(), fee = 0, `type` = 1, status = 1 where lock_no = #{lock_no} and end_time is null
mapper.select: select a.* from lock_order a where a.lock_no = #{lock_no} and end_time is null
select count(id) from lock_order where end_time is null ;
